search_results.title: Son of the Morning (novel)
search_results.snippet: Son of the Morning is a 1978 novel by American author Joyce Carol Oates. The book was first published on August 1, 1978 through Vanguard Press.

search_results.title: Son of the Morning by Akwaeke Emezi
search_results.snippet: Son of the Morning is a fascinating story. Gali is a such a cool FMC. Her motivation and background sucked me in from the get go. Lucifer was a delight as well.
